::Spears::

She looked out one of the pod windows and saw that they were about a 
foot above the water.  She gave a sigh of relief. "No, I don't have a 
fear of floating, or swimming either.  It's just heights that I have 
a problem with."  She looked out the window and the storm.
"Well, what do we do now? Just float along for now?"
She felt stupid for jumping into the arms of another bot in a moment 
of panic.

"look, I'm sorry for all the panicking I did. I just can't deal with 
high places."
She looked down remembering how long ago she loved to be high up.  
Now she was scared after being 50 in the air.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker raises an eyebrow, looking at Spears as she steps back from 
him and 
> sits down. He was a bit surprised at her reaction, but panic 
brought on  strange reactions.
> 
> "Relax. We're at 0 feet above sea level. In other words floating 
till we 
> regain energy," he grins then, "You have no fear of floating, do 
you?"
